name: Five Food Groups Macaroni Salad
author: MAMADAVIS
summary: This may have some strange ingredients, but it is the only kind of macaroni salad I will eat! It started as a fourth grade experiment on trying to incorporate all five food groups into a simple, tasty recipe.
ingredients: ½ (1 ounce) package ranch dressing mix
1 (12 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
1 medium apple - peeled, cored, and chopped
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta, cook for 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente
In a large bowl, mix the cooled pasta, creamy salad dressing, ranch dressing mix, tuna, Cheddar cheese, apple, carrot, and raisins
Chill 1 hour in the refrigerator before serving
